snippet: The Braves won for a major league record 23rd straight time in games started by Kris Medlen, as Sunday’s victory over the Mets marked the regular-season home finale for Chipper Jones.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Atlanta Braves defeat New York Mets, 6-2, in team's regular-season home finale for third baseman Chipper Jones; Braves pitcher Kris Medlen earns his 23rd straight victory, giving up one unearned run and three hits in six innings; other baseball results noted.
lead_paragraph: The Braves won for a major league record 23rd straight time in games started by Kris Medlen, as Sunday’s victory over the Mets marked the regular-season home finale for Chipper Jones.

headline.seo: Kris Medlen Leads Braves, and Chipper Jones Says Goodbye
headline.main: Medlen Leads Braves, and Jones Says Goodbye to Home Fans
